Key Match Events: India won the toss and opted to bowl first
Ravi Bishnoi finished with his career-best figures including a sensational 4-fer
Clive Madande's handy cameo of 29 that came towards the backend
Post-Match Reflections: Sikandar Raza is the PLAYER OF THE MATCH for his all-round brilliance
Shubman Gill, the captain of India says that they didn't collectively play well as a group
